long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Language Learning with InterSub!
Turn YouTube, Netflix, and more into immersive language classrooms with InterSub ‚Äì the ultimate tool for video-based learning. With interactive subtitles, vocabulary builders, and seamless support across platforms, language learning has never been this engaging.

üöÄ What‚Äôs New:
	‚Ä¢	Crunchyroll Integration: Dive into anime and learn languages simultaneously.
	‚Ä¢	Enhanced Dual Subtitles: Choose to display secondary subtitles only when paused, perfect for focused learning.
	‚Ä¢	Keyboard Shortcuts: Quickly adjust subtitle size, positioning, and toggle features. Find all tips on the ‚ÄúHow to‚Äù page.

üéØ Key Features:
üåê Multi-Platform Compatibility: Works on 8 platforms, including Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Crunchyroll, and Udemy. Full list: intersub.cc/#platforms
üìù Bilingual Subtitles: Simultaneously display subtitles in your native and target languages for enhanced comprehension.
üî§ Popup Dictionary: Instantly translate unfamiliar words with hover functionality.
üìñ Vocabulary Builder: Automatically save new words into a personalized wordbook for later review.
üì± Mobile Integration: Access your vocabulary on mobile apps or Telegram bots for learning on the go.
üåç RTL Support: Optimized for right-to-left languages like Arabic, Hebrew, and Urdu.

üí° How It Works:
	1.	Install the extension (it‚Äôs free!).
	2.	Watch videos on supported platforms.
	3.	Hover over subtitles for instant translations ‚Äì no more pausing for Google Translate!
	4.	Save new words to your vocabulary and review them on mobile apps or export to Excel.

üåü Premium Features:
	‚Ä¢	Unlimited word lookups
	‚Ä¢	Advanced collocation detection
	‚Ä¢	Full access to personal vocabulary and stats

üí∞ Pricing Plans:
	‚Ä¢	Free Plan: 15 lookups/month or unlimited with ads.
	‚Ä¢	Premium Plans: Starting at $2.5/month, with pay-as-you-go options.

üéì Perfect For:
	‚Ä¢	Language learners
	‚Ä¢	Busy professionals
	‚Ä¢	Students
	‚Ä¢	Cultural enthusiasts

üåç Language Support:
Supports 30+ languages, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, Ukrainian, and more. Full list: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e0aTeF6LNrxq8LYUiCT5RwY2Gzyswf-k1MrSlxI38lA/edit#gid=0.

üíé Why Choose InterSub?
	‚Ä¢	Revolutionize how you learn with video-based learning tools.
	‚Ä¢	Learn without pausing your favorite shows and educational courses.
	‚Ä¢	Affordable, intuitive, and effective.

Unlike Language Reactor, LingQ, Trancy, and Lingopie InterSub supports for more platforms, provides flexible Pay-as-you-go plans with lifetime translation packages for those who don‚Äôt want a monthly subscription, and has exclusive integration with mobile apps and chatbots that automatically sync looked up words.

Start your language learning journey today with InterSub ‚Äì where entertainment meets education!

üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Questions?
	‚Ä¢	Visit: intersub.cc
	‚Ä¢	Join our Discord community: https://discord.com/invite/AgdxpVmHhb
